item.description:
Its a Collective Saturday Night!!!!!

Point Street Dueling Pianos (where Hi-Hat "used" to be).

It just so happens that a few other meetup groups, the Boston-Providence Single Parents Group and the Providence Bicycling, Walking, Archery and Running Group are going ice skating earlier and then heading over to the Point Street Dueling Pianos in Davol Square. Several people have suggested this venue for an MNM, but they aren't open on Mondays. SO, what better way to check this new place out than on a Saturday in the dead of winter AND with a few other Meetup Groups!!!

The show starts at 8pm. It should be fun and I've heard its great!!!!!!

Hope to see you there!

Please RSVP so I know who you are!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the silver scarf!
item.name: Collective Saturday Night - Dueling Piano Bar!
